703460.name: RPG Maker MV - Cinematic Drums
703460.description:
Nothing invokes the sense of battle better than huge, tribal, epic drums. Since the earliest days mankind has used drums to invoke the wrath of the Gods, for communion with higher spirits, and to instill fear in the hearts of the enemy.

Bittersweet Entertainment brings you Cinematic Drums, a fantastic mix of battle ready thunderous themes, ethnic performances, modern EDM and techno hybrid beats, all the epic, bold, and battle ready rhythmic beats your games and battles need.

Track list:
1- Ancient Method
2- Beast Drum
3- Crucial Tom
4- Death Rate
5- Drumland
6- Electric Desk
7- Epic Taiko
8- Filmbeat
9- Filmbeat 2
10- Filmbeat 3
11- Filmbeat 4
12- Gold Tower
13- Goliath
14- Goliath 2
15- Horror Effect
16- Huge Impact
17- Impressive Hit
18- Machine's Drum
19- Metal Bell
20- Metal Bomb
21- Metalman
22- Metalman 2
23- More Than Now
24- Old Kit
25- Poison Drum
26- Ring of Power
27- Rolling Cake
28- Short Tom

Features:
  • 28 BGM themes
  • Composed with high quality drums and percussion
  • .M4A, and .OGG formats included
  • Tested in and formatted for use in RPG Maker MV
703460.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
